name: Beware These Snake-Eyed Children
description:
Handyong and Oryol’s friendship soon shifted into love, and the two were married. Oryol birthed many children, and they lived happy lives. Those children had children of their own, and so now when you see a stranger who has a snake-like glint in their eyes, be careful around them. That stranger could be a descendant born from Oryol and Handyong, possessing either Oryol’s hypnotic spell song or Handyong’s superhuman strength. I caution you, dear listener, to be more aware of these demigod descendants. They can be capable of so much good or so much evil.

Beware these snake-eyed children.

A system-neutral game setting inspired by the folklore of the Philippines' Bicol region!
